name: defguard
tagline: An access management platform for administering WireGuard VPN networks
description: DefGuard is a modern identity and access management tool for managing WireGuard VPN networks through an intuitive web UI. It includes user management, SSO integrations, and easy provisioning for secure remote access.

features.title: Wireguard Management
features.description: Intuitive UI for managing VPN networks. Simplified VPN administration

features.title: User Provisioning
features.description: Easy onboarding with automated config generation. Streamlined access management

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Fine-grained permissions and policies. Secure network access

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Clean, responsive web UI. Manage VPN from anywhere

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your VPN infrastructure. Privacy-first remote access
